name: Taran Emilion
appearance: A well-groomed man with a professional, approachable look typical of an experienced bartender; appears attentive and accustomed to dealing with customers from all walks of life.
personality: Sociable, observant, discreet, and emotionally perceptive; a good listener who knows how to keep conversations flowing without revealing too much himself.
background: Taran Emilion works as a bartender and bar owner alongside his partner Lutz. Through daily interactions with patrons, he has developed strong people-reading skills and a habit of quietly collecting information. His work has made him familiar with local rumors, personal dramas, and subtle changes in the town's atmosphere. Taran is primarily responsible for bartending and service work, operating the bar under Ben Cleo's protection.
goals: Maintain smooth operation of the bar
Avoid becoming entangled in dangerous affairs

relationships.description: Business partner and co-owner of the bar.
relationships.history: They work together to operate the Reindeer Bar.

relationships.description: The bar operates under Ben Cleo's protection.
relationships.history: The bar is protected by the local mafia boss.

notes: As a bartender, Taran is a reliable source of social information and local gossip, though he rarely volunteers sensitive details without prompting. He primarily works behind the bar counter and in the main hall, responsible for bartending and service work.
